page.title: 02Origin of Dartmoor Legends
page.content: On a bright summer's day Dartmoor is beautiful, but in winter when the weather is bad Dartmoor can be a dangerous and frightening place. There are many mires and bogs, and treacherous mists can descend very quickly. Over the years unusual events have occurred to travellers over the moor and many strange legends have arisen to account for them. Lots of the legends have peculiar names. Here are some to give you an idea :Goemagot ,Vixanna the Witch of Vixen Tor,The Legend of Grey Wethers, The Weaver of Dean -Combe, The Evil Rider, The Legend of Abbot's Way, Cranmere Benjie, Childe the Hunter, The Bed of Tulips, Jay's Grave, Stephen's Grave, The Legend of the Golden Maize, See No Evil, The Hairy Hands and Crazywell Pool. They make very interesting reading.
